content: Love the game but it just lost all my save data. Finally got green masks on all the base difficulty level last night. I opened the app today, and it's back to the character creation screen. replyContent: We're terribly sorry for the issue, Samuel. Unfortunately, we're unable to restore your progress for technical reasons. We'll investigate the issue to prevent the same error happening again. If you made purchase, please email us at support@herocraft.com and we'll cancel ones.

content: This is my absolute favourite game for my Samsung 8.9 tablet. It shows that Android games can be brilliant in all ways, graphics, sound, motions and movement, user interface, fun factor - and support = purely addictive.   For a while the game wouldn't start on the tablet, and kudos to Herocraft, they tried hard to get me going again.  A word to the complaining crowd about the "purchase of game points" - that's just an added option for people too lazy to play some extra rounds to earn them the gamers way.  This is in my opinion definitely the best Match3 game for Android out there.
replyContent: Hi Sabine! There might be different causes of your problem. For example you could have updated your device firmware. Please reinstall the game, it should work.
